languages.text: "Тихого вокса вам, чегнари. Тихого вокса, господин Пощада". {n}Джай получает в ответ вежливые кивки. На лицах хладных торговцах, обращенных к ней, написана смесь симпатии, сочувствия и боязливой осторожности, словно к заразному родственнику.{/n}

"Quiet vox to you all, chegnars. Quiet vox to you, Master Mercy." {n}Jae receives polite nods in response. The Cold Traders' faces that are turned toward her reveal a mixture of support, compassion, and wariness, as if in proximity to an infected relation.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Тихого вокса вам, чегнари. Тихого вокса, господин Пощада". {n}Джай получает в ответ вежливые кивки. На лицах хладных торговцах, обращенных к ней, написана смесь симпатии, сочувствия и боязливой осторожности, словно к заразному родственнику.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Quiet vox to you all, chegnars. Quiet vox to you, Master Mercy." {n}Jae receives polite nods in response. The Cold Traders' faces that are turned toward her reveal a mixture of support, compassion, and wariness, as if in proximity to an infected relation.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Quiet vox to you all, chegnars. Quiet vox to you, Master Mercy." {n}Jae receives polite nods in response. The Cold Traders' faces that are turned toward her reveal a mixture of support, compassion, and wariness, as if in proximity to an infected relation.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Quiet vox to you all, chegnars. Quiet vox to you, Master Mercy." {n}Jae receives polite nods in response. The Cold Traders' faces that are turned toward her reveal a mixture of support, compassion, and wariness, as if in proximity to an infected relation.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Quiet vox to you all, chegnars. Quiet vox to you, Master Mercy." {n}Jae receives polite nods in response. The Cold Traders' faces that are turned toward her reveal a mixture of support, compassion, and wariness, as if in proximity to an infected relation.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “请安静，各位。请安静，悯慈大师。”{n}婕伊礼貌地点头回应着。其他冷市商人将目光转向了婕伊，众人的脸上流露着支持、怜悯与戒备的复杂表情，仿佛在面对着身染恶疾的亲戚一般。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Quiet vox to you all, chegnars. Quiet vox to you, Master Mercy." {n}Jae receives polite nods in response. The Cold Traders' faces that are turned toward her reveal a mixture of support, compassion, and wariness, as if in proximity to an infected relation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “请安静，各位。请安静，悯慈大师。”{n}婕伊礼貌地点头回应着。其他冷市商人将目光转向了婕伊，众人的脸上流露着支持、怜悯与戒备的复杂表情，仿佛在面对着身染恶疾的亲戚一般。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「シェグナーの皆さん、静かに。マスター・マーシー、お静かに」{n}ジェイは丁寧にうなずいた。彼女に向けられたコールド・トレーダーたちの顔は、まるで感染者に近付いたかのように、支持と同情と警戒が入り混じったものだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Quiet vox to you all, chegnars. Quiet vox to you, Master Mercy." {n}Jae receives polite nods in response. The Cold Traders' faces that are turned toward her reveal a mixture of support, compassion, and wariness, as if in proximity to an infected relation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「シェグナーの皆さん、静かに。マスター・マーシー、お静かに」{n}ジェイは丁寧にうなずいた。彼女に向けられたコールド・トレーダーたちの顔は、まるで感染者に近付いたかのように、支持と同情と警戒が入り混じったものだった。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Voco silencioso a todos, chegnars. Voco silencioso, maestro Mercy». {n}Jae recibe un educado asentimiento por respuesta. Las caras de los Comerciantes Fríos muestran una mezcla de apoyo, compasión y cautela, como si contemplaran a una pariente infectada.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Quiet vox to you all, chegnars. Quiet vox to you, Master Mercy." {n}Jae receives polite nods in response. The Cold Traders' faces that are turned toward her reveal a mixture of support, compassion, and wariness, as if in proximity to an infected relation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Voco silencioso a todos, chegnars. Voco silencioso, maestro Mercy». {n}Jae recibe un educado asentimiento por respuesta. Las caras de los Comerciantes Fríos muestran una mezcla de apoyo, compasión y cautela, como si contemplaran a una pariente infectada.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Faites silence, chegnars. Toi aussi, Mercy. » {n}En réponse, Jae reçoit des hochements de tête polis. Les visages tournés vers elle laissent paraître un mélange de soutien, de compassion et de méfiance, comme si les marchands présents se trouvaient à proximité d'une parente malade.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Quiet vox to you all, chegnars. Quiet vox to you, Master Mercy." {n}Jae receives polite nods in response. The Cold Traders' faces that are turned toward her reveal a mixture of support, compassion, and wariness, as if in proximity to an infected relation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Faites silence, chegnars. Toi aussi, Mercy. » {n}En réponse, Jae reçoit des hochements de tête polis. Les visages tournés vers elle laissent paraître un mélange de soutien, de compassion et de méfiance, comme si les marchands présents se trouvaient à proximité d'une parente malade.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ein stilles Vox an Euch alle, Chegnar. Ein stilles Vox an Euch, Meister Mercy." {n}Jae wird daraufhin mit höflichen Nicken begegnet. Die Gesichter der ihr zugewandten Kalthändler zeigen eine Mischung aus Unterstützung, Mitgefühl und Vorsicht, so als ob sie sich untereinander nicht wohlfühlen würden.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Quiet vox to you all, chegnars. Quiet vox to you, Master Mercy." {n}Jae receives polite nods in response. The Cold Traders' faces that are turned toward her reveal a mixture of support, compassion, and wariness, as if in proximity to an infected relation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ein stilles Vox an Euch alle, Chegnar. Ein stilles Vox an Euch, Meister Mercy." {n}Jae wird daraufhin mit höflichen Nicken begegnet. Die Gesichter der ihr zugewandten Kalthändler zeigen eine Mischung aus Unterstützung, Mitgefühl und Vorsicht, so als ob sie sich untereinander nicht wohlfühlen würden.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Vokslarınıza sükûnet dilerim çegnarlar. Senin de voksuna sükûnet dilerim Üstat Merhamet." {n}İnsanlar, Jae'ın sözlerine başlarıyla karşılık veriyor. Soğuk Tacirlerin ona dönen yüzlerinde destek, şefkat ve ihtiyat içeren ifadeler var. Sanki hastalıklı bir hısımlarının yakınındaymış gibiler.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Quiet vox to you all, chegnars. Quiet vox to you, Master Mercy." {n}Jae receives polite nods in response. The Cold Traders' faces that are turned toward her reveal a mixture of support, compassion, and wariness, as if in proximity to an infected relation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Vokslarınıza sükûnet dilerim çegnarlar. Senin de voksuna sükûnet dilerim Üstat Merhamet." {n}İnsanlar Jae'ın sözlerine başlarıyla karşılık veriyor. Soğuk Tacirlerin ona dönen yüzlerinde, destek, şefkat ve ihtiyatın karışımı ifadeler var. Sanki hastalıklı bir hısımlarının yakınlarındaymış gibiler.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
